name: Blackjack Live
description:
Blackjack Live is the ONLY blackjack game that has JACKPOT!

Play Blackjack as if you were at the casino! This is a free blackjack game which is designed for MacOS that you can play against the dealer and see who can WIN by getting 21 without going bust!

FEATURES:
• Play online and share other players' luck by tap balloons
• Challenge friends to get free bonus chips
• FREE hourly bonus chips
• Become Jack King and win huge prize
• Join Live Contest automatically and win HUGE prize every 20 minutes
• Large cards and chips
• Easy and fun to play
• King of Vegas? Try your luck around the world in Dubai, Monaco, Paris, Las Vegas, Caribbean, and Atlantic.
• Tap chips, cards and table to play blackjack as if you were at the casino
• Tap to split your cards
• Win more chips when you get blackjack
• Blackjack casino rules pays 3:2
• Insurance: pays 2:1 if the dealer gets blackjack
• Choose between different table with different bet

If you go bust - don't worry, you can get hourly free chips!

We hope you enjoy playing Blackjack Live! If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us using the app.

Note:
- This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
